description:
Polygon background created using p5.js

Noise scale: Increasing this will zoom the camera out, decreasing it will zoom the camera in. Higher values may cause lag.

Time scale: How fast the animation will be.

Voxel size: Size of the grid used to generate the polygons. Lower values will create high lag.

Draw amount: How many polygon layers there are.

Draw threshold begin: Lower values will make the background more filled, but it will also create lag.

Loop length: How long the animation will be in frames, set to 0 to disable loop.

Grid snap fx: Enabling this will make the borders of the polygons more fuzzy.

Async render: If you're using lower voxel size values, one frame may take more than 10 seconds to render. Enabling this will render the frame in the background while it's still being drawn.

Debug: Don't enable this.
title: p5.js Polygon Background
